headlines.description: Bologna raced to a two-goal lead in five minutes and were pulled back to 2-2 before a stoppage-time goal gave them a 3-2 win over Lecce.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bologna push Lecce closer to Serie B with last-gasp winner

headlines.description: AS Roma midfielder Jordan Veretout converted two penalties to give them a 2-1 win over his former club Fiorentina.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roma get another win on Veretout's two penalties

headlines.description: Serie A leading scorer Ciro Immobile scored a hat-trick, taking his tally to 34 league goals this term, as Lazio came from behind to thump Verona.
headlines.shortLinkText: Immobile hits hat-trick as Lazio thump Verona

headlines.description: Juventus have won a ninth consecutive Serie A title following their win over Sampdoria on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo scores to help Juventus claim 9th straight crown
